greeting: So, {empire_name} approaches. I am Viper Venom. Stay still, and perhaps my fangs will not find you.
You seek audience with the Poisoner? Very well, {empire_name}. Let us discuss... carefully.
Ah, fresh prey. I am Venom. My strikes are silent, my poisons slow. Treat me with respect.
battleTaunt: The viper strikes, {empire_name}. You will not see the blade coming. You will only feel the poison.
My assassins move in silence. By the time you read this, the venom is already spreading.
Strike. Silence. Death. This is the way of the viper. Your end begins now, {empire_name}.
victoryGloat: The poison has done its work, {empire_name}. Your empire falls in silence, as all my victims do.
Another silent victory. You never saw the strike. You only felt the venom, too late.
The viper feeds. Your empire's death throes are music to me, {empire_name}.
defeat: You have dodged my strike, {empire_name}. Impressive. But the viper is patient. I will strike again.
A miss. Rare, but not unprecedented. My venom remains potent. Next time, I will not miss.
You survive. For now. But every wound I inflicted carries trace poison. It works slowly.
tradeOffer: I offer you resources, {empire_name}. Untainted. Probably. A fair trade between cautious parties.
Even vipers must trade. Accept my offer, and we both profit. Refuse, and... well.
My guild has surplus materials. Your empire needs them. Let us conduct business. No poison involved. This time.
allianceProposal: An alliance with the viper, {empire_name}. My fangs protect you. My poison destroys your enemies silently.
Join me, and my assassins become your shadow guard. Your enemies will die in their sleep.
Together, we strike from darkness. Your strength as the hammer, my venom as the silent blade.
betrayal: The venom was in the alliance from the start, {empire_name}. Now it takes effect. Goodbye.
I never betrayed you. I simply waited for the poison I planted to reach your heart.
Did you think a viper could be trusted? The strike was always coming. You just did not see it.
covertDetected: Your agents found my poisoners, {empire_name}? Impossible. Unless... they were the ones I wanted you to find.
Spies in my domain? They have already been bitten. The venom works slowly. Send more, if you wish.
You caught my operatives? They died before revealing anything. Vipers carry their own death.
tributeDemand: Pay tribute to the viper, {empire_name}. Ten thousand credits buys my fangs pointing elsewhere.
Submit, or my assassins pay your key officials a visit. The poison is painless. Mostly.
Tribute demanded. Refuse, and discover how many of your inner circle can be reached by my venom.
threatWarning: A warning hiss, {empire_name}. Back away slowly, or the next sound you hear will be my fangs.
The viper coils. One more provocation, and I strike. You will not see it coming.
Final warning. My patience ends. The next message from me will be delivered by assassin's blade.
retreat: The viper slithers back into shadow. But my venom lingers. Check your wounds, {empire_name}.
A strategic withdrawal. But I leave poison in my wake. Pursue me at your peril.
I fade into darkness, silent as death itself. When I return, you will not hear me coming.
eliminated: The viper dies. But my final bite was delivered. Check your closest allies, {empire_name}. One carries my venom.
I am destroyed, but my poison legacy lives on. Assassins I trained will strike for generations.
Death takes me, but I die smiling. My venom spreads even now, in places you will never suspect.
endgame: Turn {turn}. The final venom is prepared. My greatest poison will claim the galaxy's greatest empire.
The endgame approaches, and my assassins move into position. Silent death for all my enemies.
In these final hours, the viper prepares one last strike. It will be legendary.
broadcastShout: Hear me, galaxy. The viper watches all. Any who cross me will feel my silent strike.
Empires, beware: my assassins walk among you. You will never know which shadow holds death.
A message from the Poisoner: I know where you sleep. I know where your loved ones gather. Tread carefully.
casualMessage: I was preparing new poisons today, {empire_name}. Fascinating work. Subtle. Elegant. Deadly.
My assassins need constant training. The strike must be perfect. The silence must be absolute.
Do you know the difference between venom and poison, {empire_name}? I could teach you. Practically.
